name: Otherworld Heroes
description:
Explore new world’s, fight magical battles and complete epic missions in Otherworld Heroes, the first-ever AR location-based MMORPG.

Select your hero and enjoy this enchanting universe, full of heroes, villains, monsters, and magic. Everywhere you walk you’ll encounter new challenges, incredible opportunities and face mortal dangers!

- EXPLORE THE UNIVERSE - Fight evil monsters, find powerful magical items, and go on epic quests for glory and power with your friends!

- REAP THE REWARDS - Earn XP by collecting gold and precious resources to improve your strength and power and unlock mystical secrets.

- LEVEL UP YOUR HERO - Unlock new skills and new weapons to increase your fighting power. You’ll need it to take on massive monsters and difficult battles.

The world in Otherworld Heroes is like no other you’ve ever experienced. You can enjoy it with your friends, exploring, fighting and questing through this magical universe as a team.

Together, you’ll tackle epic adventures and real-time battles that will build friendships that last forever.

Are you ready for the challenge?

※ NOTES ※

- Otherworld Heroes is free to download and play with in-app purchase options.
- A cellular is required to play the game. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- The game also requires a GPS connection to enable the map-based gameplay.
- You may experience difficulties playing the game if connections are weak or inconsistent.
- Otherworld Heroes is compatible with the following devices: [ iOS version 11 or higher ].

[ Permissions Guide ]
- (Mandatory) Location Access : Otherworld Heroes needs access to your device's location in order to enable map-based gameplay.

[ How to revoke approval of access authority ]
- Please follow the below steps to revoke approval of Permissions.

[ iOS version 11 or higher ]
- Settings > Otherworld Heroes > Location > revoke Permissions

[ Lower than iOS version 11 ]
- Update OS or delete App to revoke approval of Permissions
